text:
>a worldview that isn't interested in an accurate well-articulated picture of reality is inevitably going to run into situations where it's ineffective in guiding people well 

Well put.

> Also, if Rowling made Quidditch more sophisticated and complicated with better rules, wouldn't people have also criticized that just the same?

I'd say no. Perhaps criticized far less.

The game could have been improved without complicating the rules at all.
